name: Arch Rune
description:
Casting Runes and Forging Runewords in search of the Arch Rune

Use the signs in your favour, cast them on enemies in range to neutralize them and forge runewords to reap their power.

Cast two to five runes to forge a runeword of unseen rewards. 

Controls

Keyboard Controls

  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Cast Rune - Left Click
  • Forge Runeword - Right Click

Gamepad Controls

  • Move - Stick or D-pad
  • Aim - Right Stick
  • Cast Rune - Right Trigger
  • Forge Runeword - Left Trigger
